briefTitle: Trial Comparing the Effects of Linear Versus Nonlinear Aerobic Training in Women With Operable Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Exercise Intensity Trial (EXCITE): A Randomized Trial Comparing the Effects of Linear Versus Nonlinear Aerobic Training in Women With Operable Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: To compare the effect of high-intensity to moderate-intensity aerobic training, relative to attention-control, on peak oxygen consumption.
